content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for considering my apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what you are looking for in terms of rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Maria Mamani: "I am looking for the lowest possible price. I am a student and I want to have a good relationship with my landlord. I am also responsible and dependable. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us."
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Maria. While I understand your desire for a lower rental price, I am afraid that I am unable to offer that at this time. The apartment is a valuable investment for me, and I need to ensure that I am getting the best possible return on my investment. That being said, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a rental price that works for both of us. May I ask what your budget is for rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Maria Mamani: "My budget is 300 Euros per month. I am willing to be flexible and negotiate. I appreciate your willingness to work with me."
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your understanding, Maria. Based on the information you have provided, I am willing to negotiate with you on the rental price. I am willing to accept a rental price of 325 Euros per month. This price takes into account the value of the apartment and the expenses I incur in maintaining it. I hope this is a fair and reasonable price for you. Would you be willing to agree to this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
